mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.name, t.sort from blog_tags t left join blog_article_tags bat on bat.tags_id = t.id left join blog_article a on a.id = bat.article_id where t.del_flag = FALSE and a.id = #{articleId}

SELECT t.id, t.name, t.sort, t.create_date as createDate, t.create_by as createId, t.update_by as updateId, t.update_date as updateDate, t.remarks, t.del_flag as delFlag, (select count(0) FROM blog_article_tags where tags_id = t.id) as tagsUseCount FROM blog_tags t where t.del_flag = false
and t.name like CONCAT('%',#{params.name},'%')
